page.title: 01 OUR D BLOCK
page.content: Our D block is located on the Eastern edge of Barnstaple.There are Georgian, Victorian,and pre-war houses,also much council housing built since the war and some recent housing estate development.The new industrial area is sited along the former railway line which is now the route the link road will take to join the MS.The rest of the of the block is mostly pastoral farming.The most important building in our D block is the North Devon District Hospital at Raleigh Park above the town.Most areas are within reasonable distance of the town centre some areas have a bus service and there is a Little Red bus service to a Supermarket.Many people are employed in the many small industrial units or service industries and either walk, bicycle,or drive to work.
